trim-solo.title: Paraglider Trimming
trim-solo.description: Restore your wing's handling and brake feel. We measure every line against manufacturer specs, detect asymmetries, and correct deviations so your glider flies the way it should.

trim-tandem.title: Tandem Trimming
trim-tandem.description: Keep your tandem wing balanced and predictable. Full line measurement and trim correction for two-seater wings.

visual-solo.title: Visual Check (Solo)
visual-solo.description: Visual cloth and canopy inspection. A quick health check without testing or trimming.

visual-tandem.title: Visual Check (Tandem)
visual-tandem.description: Visual cloth and canopy inspection for tandem wings.

service-solo.title: Full Glider Service
service-solo.description: The complete health check. Cloth porosity and tear testing, line strength analysis, riser inspection, and full trim measurement with corrections. You get a detailed report showing exactly what was found and fixed.

service-tandem.title: Tandem Full Service
service-tandem.description: Everything in the full service, designed for tandem wings. Cloth testing, line strength, riser inspection, and complete trim analysis with corrections.

service-harness.title: Harness Inspection
service-harness.description: Thorough 20-point inspection covering buckles, straps, stitching, airbag, back protection, and karabiners. Know your harness is safe before you fly.

repack-solo.title: Reserve Repack
repack-solo.description: 22-step sequential repack following APPI procedure. Includes deployment test, condition assessment, and reintegration into your harness.

repack-steerable.title: Steerable Reserve Repack
repack-steerable.description: Professional repacking for steerable reserves. Same thorough 22-step process, adapted for guided parachute systems.

repair.title: Glider Repair
repair.description: Canopy repairs, line replacements, and component fixes. Get in touch with photos of the damage and we'll assess what's needed.
